articles.title: Cris Collinsworth’s Recent Comments Garnered a Fired up Reaction From Pat McAfee - Sportscasting
articles.description: NBC's Cris Collinsworth made some comments during a recent game that were pretty polarizing. They ultimately got Pat McAfee fired up, too.
articles.content: It seems like Cris Collinsworth always makes a comment or two during Sunday Night Football broadcasts that end up becoming pretty polarizing. Heck, almost every NFL broadcaster has probably said some… [+5005 chars]
